headline.main: Toyota Halts Two Production Lines After Blast at Supplier's Plant
headline.print_headline: Toyota Halts Two Production Lines After Blast at Supplier's Plant

docs.snippet: Toyota Motor Corp said on Friday it has suspended output at two production lines affected by an explosion earlier this week at a plant operated by a supplier, after briefly resuming operations at all affected lines....
docs.lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor Corp said on Friday it has suspended output at two production lines affected by an explosion earlier this week at a plant operated by a supplier, after briefly resuming operations at all affected lines.

headline.main: Acrobat Who Gave Woman HIV to Be Freed From Australian Jail
headline.print_headline: Acrobat Who Gave Woman HIV to Be Freed From Australian Jail

docs.snippet: A Zimbabwean circus acrobat who infected his girlfriend with HIV through frequent unprotected sex received a suspended sentence on Friday after winning an appeal against a conviction of deliberately passing on the virus that causes AIDS....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Zimbabwean circus acrobat who infected his girlfriend with HIV through frequent unprotected sex received a suspended sentence on Friday after winning an appeal against a conviction of deliberately passing on the virus that causes AIDS.

headline.main: Hyundai Motor Plans Luxury Electric Car Under Genesis Brand: Executive
headline.print_headline: Hyundai Motor Plans Luxury Electric Car Under Genesis Brand: Executive

docs.snippet: South Korean automaker Hyundai Motor Co plans to launch a luxury all-electric vehicle under its Genesis marque to build out the lineup of its new premium brand, Senior Vice President Manfred Fitzgerald said....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korean automaker Hyundai Motor Co plans to launch a luxury all-electric vehicle under its Genesis marque to build out the lineup of its new premium brand, Senior Vice President Manfred Fitzgerald said.

headline.main: Napoli's Sacrifice Fly Gives Indians Win in 9th 5-4
headline.print_headline: Napoli's Sacrifice Fly Gives Indians Win in 9th 5-4

docs.snippet: Francisco Lindor broke out of his slump at the perfect time for the Cleveland Indians....

headline.main: Samsung SDS Says Considering Spinning Off Some of Its Businesses
headline.print_headline: Samsung SDS Says Considering Spinning Off Some of Its Businesses

docs.snippet: South Korea's Samsung SDS Co Ltd said on Friday it was considering spinning off its logistics process outsourcing and IT systems services businesses but no decisions have been made....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korea's Samsung SDS Co Ltd said on Friday it was considering spinning off its logistics process outsourcing and IT systems services businesses but no decisions have been made.

headline.main: Orioles Hit 7 Homers, Beat Red Sox 12-7 for Series Split
headline.print_headline: Orioles Hit 7 Homers, Beat Red Sox 12-7 for Series Split

docs.snippet: Mark Trumbo and Adam Jones each homered twice, Manny Machado delivered a tiebreaking drive in the seventh inning and the Baltimore Orioles hit a season-high seven long balls in a 12-7 victory over the Boston Red Sox on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Trumbo and Adam Jones each homered twice, Manny Machado delivered a tiebreaking drive in the seventh inning and the Baltimore Orioles hit a season-high seven long balls in a 12-7 victory over the Boston Red Sox on Thursday night.

headline.main: Japan's Services Sector Returns to Modest Growth in May, PMI at 50.4
headline.print_headline: Japan's Services Sector Returns to Modest Growth in May, PMI at 50.4

docs.snippet: Japan's services sector activity expanded in May, bouncing back from a contraction in the previous month due to a modest increase in new orders, a private survey showed on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's services sector activity expanded in May, bouncing back from a contraction in the previous month due to a modest increase in new orders, a private survey showed on Friday.

headline.main: China May Services Growth Cools to Three-Month Low, Hiring Slows-Caixin PMI
headline.print_headline: China May Services Growth Cools to Three-Month Low, Hiring Slows-Caixin PMI

docs.snippet: Growth in China's services sector cooled to a three-month low in May as new business and hiring slowed, a private survey showed on Friday, echoing signs of fading momentum elsewhere in the economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Growth in China's services sector cooled to a three-month low in May as new business and hiring slowed, a private survey showed on Friday, echoing signs of fading momentum elsewhere in the economy.

headline.main: Boy Abandoned in Japan for Being Naughty Found Alive, Unharmed
headline.print_headline: Boy Abandoned in Japan for Being Naughty Found Alive, Unharmed

docs.snippet: A Japanese boy abandoned in a dense forest by his parents for being naughty was found alive and unharmed on Friday, nearly a week after his disappearance set off a massive search that kept the nation riveted....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Japanese boy abandoned in a dense forest by his parents for being naughty was found alive and unharmed on Friday, nearly a week after his disappearance set off a massive search that kept the nation riveted.

headline.main: Sumner Redstone Has Capacity to Make Trust Decisions, Says Doctor
headline.print_headline: Sumner Redstone Has Capacity to Make Trust Decisions, Says Doctor

docs.snippet: A psychiatrist who examined Sumner Redstone twice last month found the 93-year-old retained the mental capacity needed to remove Viacom Inc Chief Executive Philippe Dauman from the trust that will eventually control the company, according to a spo...
docs.lead_paragraph: A psychiatrist who examined Sumner Redstone twice last month found the 93-year-old retained the mental capacity needed to remove Viacom Inc Chief Executive Philippe Dauman from the trust that will eventually control the company, according to a spokesman for the media mogul.
